text: I’m guessing I’m the only person who watched this live (sorry <@U0HP6TFNX>) but if you’re curious, here’s how it turned out: <https://fivethirtyeight.com/features/one-runner-came-tantalizingly-close-to-a-2-hour-marathon/>

attachments.title: One Runner Came Tantalizingly Close To A 2-Hour Marathon
attachments.text: They began in the dark. At 5:45 a.m. local time Saturday, three elite marathoners set off on a 26.2-mile run around a nearly flat 1.5-mile Formula One race track in Monza, Italy. This wasn’t a trad…
attachments.fallback: FiveThirtyEight: One Runner Came Tantalizingly Close To A 2-Hour Marathon
